item.title: About
item.description: This is a blog dedicated to the fml project, a C++ framework for high-performance dense matrix computing. Sometimes I also talk about math related to things I’m thinking about in fml. I use a lot of LaTeX in posts, so enabling JavaScript for MathJax will make things look much nicer. I don’t use any kind of trackers (that I’m aware of). Currently I use GitHub Pages for hosting. The blog framework is Hugo with a slightly modified Hugo theme onetwothree.
